ch.name: 叶洲洋
ch.title: 前端工程师
about: 在专业上，我拥有五年的工作经验，主要从事 web 开发，使用React，TypeScript 和 NodeJS 技术栈，也愿意尝试其它的技术栈。
日常生活中，热爱锻炼，喜欢跑 步 ， 打 游 戏 ， 业 余 游 戏 开 发(C++, OpenGL ， BGFX ，shader...)。
skill: 双语言沟通（中文和英文）

education.school: 新不伦瑞克大学，弗雷德里克顿，新不伦瑞克，加拿大
中国地质大学，湖北武汉

experience.title: 前端工程师
experience.company: 法本信息技术有限公司，浙江杭州
disc: 支付宝大数据项目中的可视化和商业逻辑开发，主要基于 React，Redux，TypeScript 技术栈。
和 pd，设计，测试人员以及后端紧密沟通、联调，协商出平衡可行的技术方案，确保应用易使用，代码易维护以及尽可能降低开发成本。
设计和开发复杂的可视化组件，项目架构改造。
作为独立交付 TL，和自己的组员紧密沟通，帮助他们解决问题，并尽自己的所能帮助他们学习、成长。

experience.title: 全栈工程师
experience.company: Lixar IT INC，渥太华，安大略省，加拿大
disc: 主要参与了两个客户端应用开发（加拿大贝尔公司技术人员流程管理系统和数据分析系统），基于 NodeJS、React、Redux 技术栈，获取了大量有关 Docker、Webpack 以及复杂的 NodeJS 模块架构管理的开发经验。同时也参与了部分其他项目的开发：.NET、AngularJS 项目（IOT大楼管理系统，设计及开发后端 api），JAVA 项目（加拿大贝尔产品管理系统，项目代码维护和开发）。
作为全栈工程师，参与了项目开发中的各个环节，从程序设计，架构设计，项目流程规划到写代码，部署，以及给客户提供技术支持等。我致力于写出高质量的符合团队标准的代码，以及在需要的时候提出自己的建议（严格的 lint 规则，单元测试以及 code review）。

experience.title: 技术主管及导师
experience.company: CANA association，渥太华，安大略，加拿大
disc: CANA 是一个致力于帮助留学生及新移民解决求职问题的公益组织，免费给学员提供专业的求职培训。
作为软件工程师，我加入 CANA 成为了 CANA 的技术主管及导师，教授学员 web 应用开发方面的知识，以及如何准备求职过程中的技术面试。
带领 CANA 学员团队设计开发一个预约系统，主要用于给学员预约导师课程。使用 AngularJS 和 PHP 技术栈。

en.name: Zhouyang Ye
en.title: Frontend Engineer
about: On the job, I'm a Senior Technical Developer with over 5 years of experience, mainly focused on a React, TypeScript and Nodejs stack, also open to exploring other stacks.
In daily life, I'm a person who loves running, working out and playing video games, I also develop games during my leisure time(C++, OpenGL, BGFX, shader...).

education.school: University of New Brunswick, Fredericton, NB, Canada
China University of Geosciences, Wuhan, Hubei, China

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
experience.company: Farben Information Technology, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China
disc: Worked on the visualization and business logic development of big data projects for Ant Financial Services Group, the tech base is mainly React, Redux and TypeScript stack.
Work closely with PD, designer, QA and back-end developers to reach a balanced solution to make sure our app is both easy to use and easy to maintain.
Design and develop complex visualization components(charts, diagrams, pages), code refactoring.
As a TL, I'm in charge of some of the development tasks, and work closely with my teammates, do whatever I can to help them grow.

experience.title: Full stack developer
experience.company: Lixar IT INC, Ottawa, ON, Canada
disc: Worked on two major front-end solutions(technician workflow management and analysis system) developed in NodeJs, React and Redux stack. Gained extensive experience with Docker, Webpack and complex submodule Node applications. Also involved in a few other projects: .NET and AngularJs project(IOT system to manage the building, designed and implemented apis), Java project(Product management system, code maintenance and development).

As a full-stack developer, I participate in full development life-cycle, from architecture design, and planning to coding, deployment, and providing technical support to customers. I'm looking to build excellent quality code, following team standards, and proposing improvements where needed(Strict lint rules, unit tests and code reviews).

experience.title: Technical Team Lead and Mentor
disc: CANA is a non-profit organization founded by some of my friends dedicated to helping new graduates and immigrants with their job hunting skills.
As a software engineer, I am one of the mentors of CANA, teaching students web development technologies, and how to prepare for technical interviews.
Lead a team consists of CANA's students to create a reservation web system using AngularJS and PHP stack, which is used to make appointments with mentors and book classes.
